T02D3295:35b-1: badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3295:35b-3: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3295:35b-4: rje btsun ma rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3295:36a-1: par mdzad la mkhas shing tshig ngan dag gi phyogs 'jigs pa //
T02D3295:36a-2: dug 'joms skye bo'i tshogs kyi rtse dags brnyes par gyur pa'i thar pa yis //
T02D3295:36a-3: rang bzhin bde ba phun sum tshogs pa lha mo rdo rje phag mo ste //
T02D3295:36a-4: ko ka tattos bdud la 'di ni rab tu mdzes par bri bar bya /
T02D3295:36a-5: de la thun phyed lhag pa'i mtshan mo cho ga bzhin du langs la /
T02D3295:36a-6: dur khrod la sogs pa yid kyi rjes su mthun
T02D3295:36a-7: pa'i gnas 'ga' zhig tu tsandan dang bcas pa la
T02D3295:36a-8: sogs pas nye bar byugs shing /
T02D3295:36a-9: me tog gi bye brag sna tshogs pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas te /
T02D3295:36a-10: dngos su ro'i stan nam ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gnas la /
T02D3295:36a-11: byams pa la sogs la bsgom pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3295:36a-12: bas rang gi snying gar yi ge aam las byung
T02D3295:36a-13: ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hr'i: dkar
T02D3295:36a-14: po'i 'od zer gyi dra bas rdo rje phag mos
T02D3295:36a-15: dbu drangs pa'i bla ma dang /
T02D3295:36a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byas la /
T02D3295:36a-19: yang snying ga'i sa bon las kun nas byung ba'i rab tu gtum pa'i mig can ma dang /
T02D3295:36a-22: dba' bo'i blo gros ma dang /
T02D3295:36a-24: lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D3295:36a-29: rlung gi shugs can ma dang /
T02D3295:36a-31: lha mo sngo ba sangs dang /
T02D3295:36a-45: sku'i 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad de /
T02D3295:36a-51: rnam par snang mdzad rnams dbu la bzhugs pa dang /
T02D3295:36a-52: spyan gsum phyag rgya lnga dang ldan zhing zla ba'i gdan dang /
T02D3295:36b-0: thod pa'i phreng bas legs par bcings pas dbu'i zur phud @36b gsum brgyan pa dang /
T02D3295:36b-3: kha tv'am ga dang ldan zhing /
T02D3295:36b-4: mchod pas brel ba'i phyag lim log dang ldan par legs par bltas la /
T02D3295:36b-5: mchod pa'i yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D3295:36b-7: phyin chad mi byed par legs par bsdoms pa dang bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3295:36b-8: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3295:36b-9: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3295:36b-10: lam la legs par brten pa dang /
T02D3295:36b-11: bdag nyid kyi dngos po yongs su gtang ba dang /
T02D3295:36b-13: skul ba rnams kyang cho ga bzhin du rnam par bsgrubs la /
T02D3295:36b-14: bsod nams kyang yongs su bsngos te /
T02D3295:36b-15: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par bya ba las /
T02D3295:36b-16: mgo thog tu thal mo legs par kha sbyar la /
T02D3295:36b-17: tshigs su brjod pa'i dbyangs brjod pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3295:36b-18: bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba gdab
T02D3295:36b-19: par bya ba'o // de la tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D3295:36b-20: aom de bzhin gshegs kun gyis ni dbang bskur bas //
T02D3295:36b-21: sems can thams cad la ni dngos grub kun //
T02D3295:36b-22: phun tshogs 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa ni //
T02D3295:36b-23: thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D3295:36b-24: aom chos sku rang bzhin dag pa ni //
T02D3295:36b-25: bdag gi rang bzhin dag pa yin //
T02D3295:36b-27: de'i rjes thogs la mchod par bya ba dang /
T02D3295:36b-30: chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid dang /
T02D3295:36b-32: smon pa med pa'i rnam pas rmi lam gyi rkyen bzhin du ste /
T02D3295:36b-33: so so rang gis rig par bya bar lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D3295:36b-34: snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer sbar ba'i 'bar bas /
T02D3295:36b-35: kun nas snang ba med par byas te /
T02D3295:36b-36: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i
T02D3295:36b-37: rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no zhes
T02D3295:36b-38: bya ba'i nga rgyal 'di bskyed do //
T02D3295:36b-39: de nas rang gi sems yi ge pam dmar po'i ngo bor gyur par yongs su grub pa'o //
T02D3295:36b-40: de yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po'i steng
T02D3295:36b-41: du yi ge aam las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D3295:36b-42: 'khor la yi ge h'um dkar po las nyi ma'o
T02D3295:36b-43: // nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang ldan pa /
T02D3295:37a-1: hr'i: dkar pos byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D3295:37a-2: spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3295:37a-3: de dag yongs su gyur pas lo bcu drug ma'i skur gyur pa'i /
T02D3295:37a-4: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba /
T02D3295:37a-5: spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa /
T02D3295:37a-6: zhal mche ba cung zad rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D3295:37a-7: dbu skra lhug pa me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing /
T02D3295:37a-8: phyed bcings pas kyang rnam par mdzes pa /
T02D3295:37a-9: rdo rje nag po'i phreng ba gnyis kyi bar du
T02D3295:37a-10: bcug pa'i thod pa'i phreng bas bcings pa'i zur phud
T02D3295:37a-15: rnam par dag pa'i ba dan rtse gsum pa mchog
T02D3295:37a-16: tu 'bar ba phyag g-yas pa bskyod pa na gnas
T02D3295:37a-17: pa dang / sngar bshad pa'i rdo rjes ye shes
T02D3295:37a-18: kyi skyes bu 'jigs pa rjes su bsgrub par mdzad
T02D3295:37a-19: pa dang / pa / phyag g-yon pas ni 'og
T02D3295:37a-20: rtse gcig pa la steng nag po rtse lnga pa'i
T02D3295:37a-21: dbyug pa dkar po dang rjes su 'grogs pa'i skam
T02D3295:37a-25: gser gyi bum pa'i zhabs nas dang 'brel ba'i dril bu chung du sgra 'khrol ba dang ldan pa /
T02D3295:37a-26: ba dan khra bo rnam par mdzes pa'i dbyu gu dpung ba la kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D3295:37a-28: bdud bzhi'i khrag dang zhag gis legs par gang ba'i padma'i snod bsnams par mdzad pa'o //
T02D3295:37a-29: 'dzag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo
T02D3295:37a-30: bo khrag 'dzag par gyur pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba
T02D3295:37a-32: padma dmar po'i steng na nyi ma la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi skyes bu ma /
T02D3295:37a-33: g-yon bskum pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa /
T02D3295:37a-34: gos med par rab tu gdug pa'i nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D3295:37a-35: ba spu'i tshogs rnams las 'od zer spro bar mdzad ma /
T02D3295:37a-36: gzugs rgyan dang mtshungs par gyur pa /
T02D3295:37a-37: sgag pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D3295:37a-38: sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur skye dgu rnams kyi don ched cher mdzad pa /
T02D3295:37a-39: nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i: byin gyis
T02D3295:37a-40: brlabs pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang
T02D3295:37a-41: / thugs ka na ldan pa'i rdo rje phag mor bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3295:37b-0: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer @37b
T02D3295:37b-1: gyi dra bas sems can thams cad sku de dang
T02D3295:37b-2: ldan par nges par bsgrubs la /
T02D3295:37b-3: bdag nyid la legs par bcug ste /
T02D3295:37b-4: nga rang kho na bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje
T02D3295:37b-5: phag mo yin no zhes nga rgyal ba bskyed par
T02D3295:37b-6: bya ba'o // de'i rjes la rang gi lte bar
T02D3295:37b-7: sna tshogs padma la 'od zer dkar po dang ldan
T02D3295:37b-8: pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du yi ge hr'i: dkar
T02D3295:37b-9: bya ba'o // po bltas la / der sngags kyi phreng ba bgrang ba'i phreng ba'i rnam par te /
T02D3295:37b-10: dkar po 'khor lo 'khor ba'i sbyor bas kha'i sgo nas nges par byung nas /
T02D3295:37b-11: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi tshogs dang /
T02D3295:37b-19: rig pa la sogs pa rnams kyi gzi brjid kun nas blangs te /
T02D3295:37b-20: lte ba'i bu gar legs par zhugs pas bdag dang
T02D3295:37b-21: gzhan gyi gti mug thams cad skrag par byed pa'i
T02D3295:37b-22: bdag nyid can du bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3295:37b-23: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D3295:37b-24: bskul bas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D3295:37b-25: lha mo mdun du bltas la //
T02D3295:37b-26: sngar brjod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du brdar bas mchod cing //
T02D3295:37b-27: yi ge phem gyi sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3295:37b-29: dpral bar g-yon skor du bskor bas de spyan drangs par bya ba'o //
T02D3295:37b-30: de dang cig tu gyur pas sngags kyi nga rgyal bskyed par bya ba'o //
T02D3295:37b-31: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D3295:37b-32: aom rnal 'byor ba dag pas chos thams cad kyi rnal 'byor dag pa ni nga yin no //
T02D3295:37b-33: snying ga'i sa bon des yang dag par bskul bar gyur pas /
T02D3295:37b-34: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs te /
T02D3295:37b-35: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D3295:37b-36: kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa bsnams shing
T02D3295:37b-37: / de rgyu mtshan gyi rda sgra dang /
T02D3295:37b-43: glu dbyangs sna tshogs pa rnams dang /
T02D3295:37b-44: lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rgyal bar gyur cig /
T02D3295:37b-45: rgyal bar gyur cig ces ched cher byed pa dang /
T02D3295:37b-49: me tog dri zhim po'i char rab tu 'bebs pas kyang /
T02D3295:38a-0: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis @38a * //
T02D3295:38a-2: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus mdzad pa //
T02D3295:38a-3: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D3295:38a-4: de bzhin bdag kyang khrus bgyi'o //
T02D3295:38a-5: bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod pas bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro //
T02D3295:38a-6: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur
T02D3295:38a-7: ba'i dam tshig gi dpal gyi h'um bya ba 'dis
T02D3295:38a-8: byin gyis kyang brlab par bya ba'o //
T02D3295:38a-9: de dag las sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la
T02D3295:38a-10: gnas pa'i mi bskyod pas mgo la byin gyis brlabs
T02D3295:38a-12: de nas de'i rgyu mtshan du rab tu gtum pa'i
T02D3295:38a-13: mig can la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis de'i
T02D3295:38a-14: rgyu mtshan gyis mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas
T02D3295:38a-15: bdag nyid la mngon par mchod pa dang /
T02D3295:38a-16: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bdud rtsi myang ba yang bya ste /
T02D3295:38a-17: spro ba dang bsdu pa sngon du 'gro ba can
T02D3295:38a-18: gyis ji srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya ba'o
T02D3295:38a-19: // myur ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3295:38a-20: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D3295:38a-22: hr'i:/ gang gi tshe langs par 'dod pa de'i tshe sngags
T02D3295:38a-23: kyi phreng ba lte ba la gnas pa'i yi ge
T02D3295:38a-25: mchod pa sngon du btang bas smon lam rnam par dag pa btab cing /
T02D3295:38a-26: bsod nams kyang yongs su bsngos te /
T02D3295:38a-27: yi ge brgya pa yang lan bdun brjod la /
T02D3295:38a-28: lha mo'i nga rgyal kun du khyer bas chos rnams
T02D3295:38a-29: thams cad kyang de'i gzugs dang ldan par blta bar
T02D3295:38a-30: gyur pas ji ltar bde ba'i spyod lam bya ba'o
T02D3295:38a-31: // de la yi ge brgya pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D3295:38a-32: aom a'a: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D3295:38a-34: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D3295:38a-36: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D3295:38a-37: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D3295:38a-38: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D3295:38a-41: tsittam shre aam ku ru h'um /
T02D3295:38a-42: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na /
T02D3295:38a-43: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i
T02D3295:38a-44: bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a: h'um
T02D3295:38a-45: zhes bya ba'o // thun tshod gzhan la yang skad
T02D3295:38a-46: cig gis lha mo'i rnam pa sngon du byas la
T02D3295:38a-47: zhes bya ba'o // / mchod pa la sogs pa
T02D3295:38a-48: sngon du btang bas ji srid 'dod kyi bar du
T02D3295:38a-50: sngar bzhin sngags kyang bzlas te /
T02D3295:38a-51: sngar gyi bzhin du thams cad bya ba'o //
T02D3295:38a-52: nam phyed kyi thun la yang thams cad sngar bzhin du byas la /
T02D3295:38b-0: nyal ba'i dus su mgo'i phyogs su @38b bla ma dang /
T02D3295:38b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bltas te legs par mchod cing /
T02D3295:38b-3: yan lag brgyad gtugs pas phyag 'tshal ba'i bsam pas seng ge'i nyal stangs kyis nyal bar bya ba'o //
T02D3295:38b-4: de nas nam mkha' 'byung ba'i tshod la ni lha
T02D3295:38b-5: mo langs par gyur pas sngar bzhin du thams cad
T02D3295:38b-6: bya ba'o // gang yang rim pa bzhin du sa
T02D3295:38b-7: phyogs 'ga' zhig tu sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bde
T02D3295:38b-8: ba'i stan la nye bar gnas la /
T02D3295:38b-9: sems can rnams thams cad la yang snying rjes dmigs te /
T02D3295:38b-10: sdig pa bshags pa nas brtsams nas /
T02D3295:38b-11: ji srid du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang
T02D3295:38b-12: sngon du btang bas yi ge a'a: yongs su gyur
T02D3295:38b-13: pa las rang nyid kyi lce padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam
T02D3295:38b-14: pa la / yi ge hr'i:'i rnam pa 'bar bas
T02D3295:38b-15: shin tu gsal bar gyur ba ji srid 'dod kyi
T02D3295:38b-16: bar du bsgom zhing brtan par yang byas te /
T02D3295:38b-17: brgya phrag phyed kyi ri lu'i phreng ba'i bgrang phreng gi thun tshod gsum mam /
T02D3295:38b-18: thun tshod bzhir yang rung ste /
T02D3295:38b-19: rnal 'byor pas bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3295:38b-20: legs par nyal ba yang sngar gyi cho gas nyal bar bya ba'o //
T02D3295:38b-22: bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can cho ga bzhin du rjes su gnang ba thob pa /
T02D3295:38b-23: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las rnam par grol pa
T02D3295:38b-24: dad pa dang ldan zhing dam tshig dang sdom pa
T02D3295:38b-25: la gnas pa / snying rje dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byed pa la /
T02D3295:38b-26: ched cher 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pas bzo dang rig pa dang /
T02D3295:38b-27: bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
T02D3295:38b-30: 'jigs pa med pa 'khor rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang /
T02D3295:38b-32: tsha ba dang bad kan dang /
T02D3295:38b-34: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang nye bar 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3295:38b-35: gang dag zos pa dag kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro //
T02D3295:38b-36: sngags 'di'i bzlas pa grub par gyur pa na /
T02D3295:38b-37: sngags des bsngags pa'i thod lo kor gang gi lag
T02D3295:38b-38: tu byin par gyur pa de lkugs pa yin yang
T02D3295:38b-39: snyan dang gas mkhan du 'gyur ro //
T02D3295:38b-40: de'i dri tsam gyis gang dag klu la sogs pa rnams nye bar yang mi 'gyur ro//
T02D3295:39a-0: @39a * // nye bar 'tshe ba 'di dag gis nye bar 'tshe bar byed pa 'khor rnams dang /
T02D3295:39a-1: gzhan dag dang thams cad kyang nye bar phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D3295:39a-2: mang du smras la ci bya /
T02D3295:39a-3: bstan bcos la dka' ba ma spyad cing /
T02D3295:39a-4: sems rnam par g-yeng ba dang bcas pa'i blo gros blun po dag gis kyang /
T02D3295:39a-6: shes rab kyi snang ba'i sgrub thabs 'di byas pa yin na /
T02D3295:39a-7: gang yang sems brtan pa dang ldan zhing bshad ma
T02D3295:39a-8: thag gi yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa de
T02D3295:39a-9: dag la dngos grub ches myur ba nyid du 'gyur
